mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_type, enabled) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userType}, 'Y', date_format(today(),'%Y%m%d'), date_format(today(),'%Y%m%d'))
